11.title: Hermione granger

111.content:
The boy who lived couldn't help but stare.
This was, after all, a very rare occasion.
So Harry continued to stare- for so long. At the young witch, or more specifically her feet. Hermione was sitting on the gryfindor common room sofa with her face in yet another huge book, Harry was sitting in the floor leaning back on the sofa. In the perfect position to see hermione slip off her two shoes, and playfully dangle one shoe off her right foot; hermione didn't take her eyes off the book for a second as she did this. The shoe was tugged around a bit as hermione wriggled her foot, until it eventually fell off- hitting the floor by Harry's hand.
Harry looked up, hermione wasn't paying any attention. Then suddenly Harry realised what he was doing, he was actually staring at the witches feet. And even drooling at the thought of them. Harry tried to rid himself from the thoughts, but he couldn't. Then another thought came to him ...
Harry slowly moved his hand towards the black shoe. Harry gave one more glance to hermione before slowly lowering his head into the shoe. Harry took a number of deep breaths, each time inhaling more of the witches scent.
Suddenly Harry heard hermione speak from behind him, "Harry? What are you doing?" Hermione didn't sound surprised or freaked out, just curious. Harry panicked and turned his head to under the sofa, "I was...jus-" Harry began "Just- looking. Under here..."
Hermione giggled, "You truly are a awful liar." she said as shee placed the book on the floor. Harry went red, but still a bit panicked. "I'm just...uh, going to bed-" Harry got up and took a step forward. "Wait." he heard from behind him.
Hermione rubbed her foot on the sofa. "Would you mind just rubbing my feet a sec?" Harry stopped himself from saying yes too quickly. "Um...ok?" he said, trying to mask his happiness.
Hermione smirked as Harry sat down, placing the feet on his lap. He began to carresse her feet. Harry rubbed his hands up and down the witches feet, her soles were smooth and pink. Harry smiled desperate to have her feet.
"I couldn't help but think so..." hermione said, watching him. "Hmm?" Harry responded. Hermione wriggled her toes, "You've been staring at my feet for two years now." she smirked. "I went to the-"
"library?" Harry laughed, rubbing her toes.
"To look it up," Hermione continued, "And I'm ok with it, Harry." she gave a re-assuring smile. Harry looked up, "I- uh..." he mumbled. Hermione lifted one foot onto his shoulder and tapped his cheek. Harry stopped for a second, "Please don't tell Ron ..." he said finally "He'd never let me live it down." hermione rubbed her toes on Harry's cheek. "Maybe, we could make a deal." she said. Harry turned his head and gently kissed Hermione's sole.
The young witch still couldn't believe the boy who lived was at her feet.
111.title: Harry's sixth year

112.content:
Hermione granger burst through the doors of the girls Gryfindor dormity, "That snivelling little idiot!" She yelped to her fellow gryfindor's; Ginny Weasly, Angelina Johnson and Pavarotti Patil. "Calm down." Ginny said, not taking her eyes of the book she was currently engrossed in. Hermione slumped down onto her bed and slowly slipped off her black shoes, revealing her two grey sock-clad feet. Everyone in there cringed slightly at the smell.
Hermione laid down on the bed, rubbing her two feet against a pole of the four poster bed. "Draco enchanted all the books to show a picture of me kissing Ron, everyone in the school is luaghing at me!" Hermione angrily announced, Pavarotti came over and sat down at the end of Hermione's bed. "You know what you've gotta do, right?" She said, with a hint of sly in her voice. "You've got to get him back."
Hermione sat up in interest, "How?"
Ginny looked up from her book as if on cue, "Well," She smirked "There are certain spells you could use." The young ginger turned her book around for the others to see, "You can make him completely at your will, you can force him to be or you could shrink him. You can also make his senses more sensitive."
Hermione flexed her toes and smiled, "You mean, like we could make his sense of smell more sensitive."

Draco was walking down the Hogwarts halls, to the slytherin common room. He crept through the darkened dungeons, he had to be quite as it was 3 hours after curfew. He heard a creak, "He-... Hello?!" The scared blonde called out. He could almost make out a darkened shillouhete in front of him, it almost looked like Hermione. Suddenly a spell came from the darkness and Draco instantly fell to the floor, he got onto all fours against hiss own will. He then heard the spell Lumos and the whole dungeon was illuminated, towering over him was the teenage witch; Hermione.
"You little mud blood!" Draco spitted, that was possibly the worst mistake of his life. Another spell came down at him, suddenly he could smell more things, more strongly. Hermione slipped of a shoe, Draco grunted at the over bearing smell. Hermione laughed and lightly tapped the Slytherin's face with her foot, contained within her stockings. Draco screamed and tried to move his head to the side, but it wouldn't budge. Hermione Finally shoved her foot into his face and kept it there for a bit, "Ok," She said, "Let's go."
A bright red light suddenly flashed through Draco's vision and he slowly fell asleep, last last things he heard was from Hermione, "Brilliant! A pocket size Draco, or sock size..."
112.title: Draco Malfoy

1121.content:
Draco slowly opened his eyes, he slurred "Filthy mud blood." to no response. Very slowly Draco's senses came back to him. Suddenly he was hit by the odour that surrounded him, the smell of feet. Draco wasn't on all fours anymore- instead he had free will over his movements once again. Draco tried to get up, but couldn't. He managed to twist himself around, his face instantly collided with a warm grey ... Thing. The other side was slightly squishy, and from the little light available he could see it was a skin colour.
Draco couldn't remember anything from the past night, after his last class his memory was too fuzzy to see what happened afterwards.

Draco was left like that for little over half an hour, he called out but no reply came. Suddenly the grey thing Draco's face was currently pressed against dragged backwards and lifted up, elegantly. It dragged Draco back a bit and even lifted him slightly as his face stuck to the grey thing. Draco looked up and screamed. He was on the insole of a shoe. The grey thing hover above the shoe about four feet above. Draco could now see it was the sole of a sock, with a sweaty soleprint imprinted on the underside.
Draco quickly got to his feet and jumped up to the rim of the shoe, he tried to clamber out. "Who are you?! You little freak!" Draco shouted, suddenly the socked foot fell to the ground. And Hermione's head popped into Draco's field of view. The shoe was at the side of Hermione granger's bed, and hermione was now sitting on the side staring down at the hopeless blonde slytherin. Her long hair dangled down too.
Draco looked up, you could easily detect the fear in his voice "I should of known it would be you! You filthy little-"
"I don't think your in the position to say that." Draco was interrupted by someone, but it wasn't hermione. Suddenly a new face stared down at him, it was ginny weasly. "Weasly!" Draco spluttered. Hermione looked up to ginny, "Its ok, I'll handle it from here." ginny walked away and Draco heard the door shut, and lock. "Just you and me." hermione grinned and hovered the grey sock above Draco. It then cam down, surrounding Draco. Hermione scrunched her toes and clasped Draco in between them. Draco let out muffled whines. Hermione moved her foot over and dropped Draco onto the wooden floor, before he could move she quickly pinned half his body down with her foot. Draco stared up at her and cringed, "Let me up, you pathetic gryfiddor." Draco screamed. Hermione smiled. She hovered her other foot around Draco's face. "Granger!" Draco shouted "My father will hear of this." with that hermione planted her foot onto Draco's face. She rubbed it around and giggled. "It stinks." Draco mumbled. Hermione rubbed faster "Do you never know when to give up?" she laughed. Finally hermione set him free. Well, his top half at least. Draco's shirt had now untucked and his hair was a mess.
1121.title: Continue

choices: Draco gives in after a few minutes of training
11211.content:
Draco grimaced. "If you don't let me up this second I'll-" Hermione laughed, "Shush now." and yet again rubbed her socked foot around his face. "Deep sniffs." Draco heard from above the sock, he let out mumbled cries. Eventually Hermione stopped, Draco panted heavily. "Let me up now, Granger!" He said angrily, still trying to assert dominance in the situation. Hermione just looked down at him for a second, "Ready for more?" she finally said. Draco scowled, "What do you mean- you filthy ... " Draco stopped as he looked up at what she was doing. Slowly Hermioen peeled off her sock. It landed with a thud a few centimetres away from Draco. For the first time, Draco looked up in fear. "That's better." Hermione said, and wriggled her toes. The foot came down, her toes resting on his chest. She pinned him down and lifted her other socked foot that had draco's lower half pinned down. She slowly peeled that sock off too, and gently wafted it over draco's face. Hermione quickly lifted her foot off his chest and pinned his lower half down once again. Hermioen rubbed her heel on Draco's face, Draco almost turned green from the smell. "Once my father knows about this he'll-" Hermione rubbed her foot up and down his body, pushing the air out his lungs. She made sure every single toe managed to rub itself over the slytherin's face. Slowly she rubbed her foot against him until her big toe hovered over his face, she waited a moment. "Come on, kiss it." She smiled, waiting for his answer. Draco stared at the big toe that hovered over his face, it was about twice the size of his head. Draco spotted at the toe and tried to turn his head away. Hermione frowned, "You better learn your place." she said, pushing the toe into Draco's face. Then rubbing the remaining spit onto his shirt. Suddenly there was a knock at the door, Hermione turned her attention from the boy at her feet to the dormitory door. "Come in." she said, ignoring Draco; who was trying to push himself free from the foot that imprisoned him.
"Is he being good?" Draco heard from the door, he recognised the voice from earlier- it was the Weasley girl. Draco heard more footsteps coming from the door, it must of been at least three people who entered the room. Hermione glanced down at Draco, "He not being very obedient." she said, sadly. Draco saw Ginny Weasley sit down in the bed, to the right of Hermione. And to the left was Katie bell, who pooped up from the back of the bed. Ginny and Katie quickly removed their shoes and began to take off their socks. While they were distracted Draco quickly sil out from the foot that covered his lower half, he stumbled but quickly got up. Hermione spotted him, "Hey, Foot boy." she said, but Draco was already running. He ran a few feet before a giant foot suddenly came down in front of him blocking his path. Draco let out a yelp and slowly looked up. Parvati Patil stared down at him. "I think we need to tech him a lesson in obedience." Parvati said, devilishly and bent down to pick him up. Draco tried to struggle, but slowly he was moved down to the ground by the girls feet once more.
The smell was almost overwhelming now that Draco had 8 big bare feet around the size of himself surrounding him.
"Just to make sure," Hermione says, pulling out her wand, "Incarcerous." She says, pointing her wand at Draco. A flash of grey surrounded him and small brown ropes began to tie him up. Draco was too tired to shout more insults, he was just relishing the time he was now spending not under someone's feet.
"Let's begin training him then." Ginny says, smiling.
11211.title: Continue 1

choices: Another idea to test out the new slave
112111.content:
Draco tried a new tactic, he quickly closed his eyes as he was assaulted by feet. He heard the sounds of every girl int he room laughing and giggling. Draco felt strangely less ill, was he getting used to this? Draco cringed at the thought. Suddenly the feet retreated. Ginny moved her foot towards him, "Now," Weasley began "Show respect and kiss my feet." she said and shoved her soft pink sole into his face. Draco didn't move, he took deep breaths though. It was odd. Weasleys feet were nowhere near as bad... Actually, come to think of it, even Hermione's wasn't sick-inducing- really...
"Kiss!" he heard from Ginny, more urgently this time. Draco this time to a second to refuse- what was happening to him?! It must be being surrounded by mud bloods and those realted to squibs. Eventually he spotted once more a the foot. Parvati began to speak, "We need to give him a more intense workout." she gave a smirk. "I suggest," Katie Bell joined in, "he helps with our toenail polish." She said, flexing her toes. Hermione smiled, she whipped out her wand and conjured a small bottle of polish. "Excellent idea. Come on, little foot-boy." she said, placing the polish on the floor. She realised him from his ropes. "And." she said, quickly, pointing her wand at the small Draco, "I think it would be a truly awful idea to try and run."
Draco stared at her, taking a moment to decide whether he should risk running. Begrudgingly he began to open the polish, which was half the size of him. "Me first." Hermione said, watching the small Draco sloth over to her feet. Draco began to paint each toenail. He started with the big toe. He slapped the polish on, not really caring. The polish was black, at strangely nice on her toes. It was strange, as soon as the polish kissed her toenails suddenly her feet looked pretty- beautiful, even. Draco stared at the toe, he began working in the second. This time taking more time, making sure it was neat- and pretty. Slowly he worked through all her toes, on both feet- he even began to enjoy the smell. "Done." Draco said, not quite in the bad mood of just a few moments ago. Draco looked down at the witches feet, "Their so pretty," Hermione said. Draco continued to stare, "...yes, I guess they are..." Dracis voice trailed off. Suddenly he felt a nudge. Ginny's foot was gently nudging his side, "Me next, then." She said. Draco was apprehensive, this was a Weasley. A filthy, dirty- Poor, Weasley. And he was at her feet. Draco just scowled at her, "Now." Ginny said, sternly. He then remembered the wand being pointed at him. Draco scowled and moved towards the Weasley girls feet. He dragged over the polish, and gently began to paint her big toe. The polish had magically changed colour, to a scarlet red. He began to paint each nail. Then, yet again. He began to ... Enjoy It? This was a Weasley. But still, at the same time, she had great feet.

One by one Draco did all four girls feet, every time the polish changed to the colour that looked best for them. Hermione watched him carefully, she could see he was finally excepting it. Maybe even enjoying it. Draco wasn't sure what was happening to him. He finished painting Pavarti's toes a delicious bright pink. Draco was actually drooling. At feet? But it felt so natural now, it felt ... Right.
"One last test." Hermione finally said, she lifted her foot and tested the slyhterin with it. Draco's initial instinct was to run to it. Hermione smirked, " ... kiss it ... "
Draco took a few seconds, before he walked over to the foot. It was slim and soft. Draco stood next to it, inhaling the scent. Draco faltered for a moment, was he really ready to take this step? He stared at the sole, the urge to obey was quickly growing stronger. He needed this.
Draco eventually gave in, he shoved himself into the foot and hugged it tight. Kissing up and down the soft sole. His fate now sealed

Her reply is curt - she has a new boyfriend and is very busy these days...
121322.content:
Harry Potter should have been the happiest wizard alive. After all, he had rid the world from the evil Lord Voldemort and settled into a fully-committed relationship with his sweetheart, Ginny. In fact, they had been married for nearly three months now.

Yet something was troubling the most famous wizard alive. It had been lingering inside him for a few months now, threatening to escape and boil over at any moment.

Cho. Cho Chang.

Just the thought of her name sent shivers of ecstasy spreading around inside of him. The seed had probably been planted at his wedding, when she turned up, looking more attractive than he ever remembered her to be. Her cute smile, her long black hair, even her bare toes seemed ridiculously attractive...

"Harry!" Came a sharp voice ringing throughout the room, completely breaking his train of thought. "I told you to sort those old newspapers out!"

Bitterness immdetiately swept over The Boy Who Lived as he glanced across at the pile of Daily Prophets. It had been like this for a while now, especially since the wedding. It seemed as if Ginny's single,relentless mission in life was to nag and berate him, incessantly.

"Yes, dear," He called back, not without a sardonic tone.

His wife appeared in the doorway, a stern expression on her pale face. "There's no need to be like that," She said gruffly before storming off.

"I didn't..." His voice trailed off, knowing that it was fruitless to have a discussion with her. She was impossible!

He remembered when Ginny had been so relaxed, so fun, so...hot! But every time he looked at her, all he could feel was a restlessness, a regret: it had become increasingly clear that Ginny was not the woman that he wanted to spend the rest of his life with.

And then her face appeared again. Cho Chang! Perhaps it was due to the fact that they had "unfinished business", so to speak. Was it something as simple as that: that they had never officially broken up, just a few years ago when they had briefly, and unsuccessfully (it must be said) dated? That's right: Harry proposed to Ginny just a month after the demise of Voldemort: it seemed like the right thing to do. At the time, he was full of jubilation. The following summer they were married; a year on from then, here he was ruing his decision and feeling an undeniable need to see this Asian beauty.

Even on his wedding day, he nearly pronounced Cho's name instead of Ginny's: they had spoke just a few minutes before the actual service - she was clearly fixed in his head from that moment onwards. Trying his hardest to put her out of his mind, he put it down to nerves and stress: getting married was a big deal! However, since then, every single day he had found himself thinking about her, fantasising about her...

It was no good! He simply had to make some contact with her - sure he could cast a spell or take a potion that would free his mind from thoughts of Cho Chang, but why should he? He was Harry Potter - the conqueror of Voldemort, the wizard responsible for restoring peace! A considerable amount of pride stirred inside him: he had nothing to be ashamed of, nothing to hide. Grabbing a piece of parchment, he scribbled down a quick message to Cho, keeping it casual and informal, but friendly. Creeping out of the room, he ensured that Ginny wouldn't hear or intercept his message as he attached it to one of their owls. The last thing he needed was her spotting this...Merlin, the questions she would ask!

Feeling his load lightened somewhat, Harry set about his task of organising those damned newspapers...

It was no more than a few hours later that the flapping of wings interrupted him; nervous excitement built...was this Cho, replying already?! Hastily, he opened the parchment, which had a Ravenclaw emblem on it. What did it say...?
121322.title: Trouble in paradise?

choices: No - Harry doesn't want Ginny to know a thing!
He spills the beans - maybe she'd understand?
1213221.content:
His heart racing with the speed of a herd of hippogriffs, Harry's green eyes darted across the parchment.

Harry! So good to hear from you! How is married life? Was sooooo nice to see you at your wedding - what a great day that was! Such a nice surprise hearing from you...would you like to come over for tea sometime?

A sense of euphoria filled him: he was going to see Cho! This was almost immediately replaced with a feeling of guilt. What what Ginny make of this? He could pass it off innocently as meeting up with an old friend, which objectively speaking one could argue that's all this was. However, Ginny wasn't stupid. She knew full well that Cho was the first girl that Harry had ever shown an interest in. He remembered the fire in her eyes when she insisted that she take him to the Ravenclaw tower on the eve of the final battle with Voldemort...

"Have you finished sorting those newspapers yet? How long can it take?!"

Her catty voice quelled the doubts he had; that confirmed if for him: he would see Cho Chang!

Quickly penning a reply, he had to make a real effort not to declare his love for her there and then. Taking a breath, he controlled himself: his message was brief but clear. Going for tea sounded like a plan...when would be best?

"Who are you writing a message to?" Ginny appeared behind him, startling him completely.

"Oh, I, er. No one. I mean, it's just a message to Luna. Not that I have to explain myself to you," He added, with more menace than he had intended.

"Alright, keep your hair on. I was only asking," she huffed. "You don't have to be so defensive!"

"Defensive...I'm defensive? Ginny, I..." He stopped there, knowing that this would be an open window to a pointless argument, something he could really do without right now. He walked calmly away, sending his letter to Cho off, knowing that was a close shave. Now he had lied to her...it was a small lie, but a lie nonetheless. An uneasy feeling swelled inside him as his eyes met hers.

"Look," She began, a little more kindly. "I know it hasn't been easy - I thought you were a shoe-in for being an Aura..." Shame flowed inside of him at these words. He too thought that defeating Voldemort would have been an ticket straight to the wizarding job of his dreams. Not the case apparently - without his NEWTS, Harry had attempted to, unsuccessfully, obtain the qualifications that he needed. Thank the heavens he had a considerable amount of gold to his name, plus a famous name at that.

"But you know you can tell me anything, right?" She said softly, placing a slender hand on his shoulder, giving it a squeeze. His guilt threatened to overspill - this was the most tender and gentle she had been for well over a month. Maybe he should just confide in her, admit his feelings for Cho and hope that she would understand, help him - as his partner and wife - to overcome this silly, inexplicable obsession he had for a girl he had barely seen in the past few years...?
1213221.title: Cho wants to meet!

choices: He makes up something - too soon to tell her the truth!
He can't help it: Harry admits his obsession he has for her!
12132211.content:
"It's nothing," Harry fixed her with a smile. "Just a lot going on. You know how it is..."

She gave him an uneasy smile in return. He had used that line before, quite a lot recently. Being Harry Potter meant that there was always a lot going on inside. It didn't feel good to play on the fact that he was a tortured soul, though that didn't stop him!

As she walked up the stairs, his mind became absorbed on his primary objective. He just had to see Cho! She would get back to him soon. Hopefully...



"Night, Harry," Ginny pecked him briefly on the cheek before turning off her lamp and turning to her side. Within moments he could gentle snores emitting from her direction.

He couldn't believe it. Why hadn't Cho got back to him? The previous feeling of euphoria a few hours ago had been replaced with anxiety and uncertainty: had he been too keen, too forward in his last message to her? Maybe something had happened to the message - someone else could have their hands on it? What if Ron or Hermione had managed to intercept it?!

Trying his best to push those irrational thoughts away, he slipped out of bed for a glass of water. His head in his hands as he sat in the kitchen, he nearly let out a cry of frustration; this was killing him! Now that he had established some contact with Cho, he simply had to see her. He had to see her now!

it was a hasty decision but it seemed like the only one. "Accio Firebolt," he muttered, loud enough so that his broom flew towards to his open hand. Yes, he would find Cho! He didn't know her address but he would be able to find out: a trip to The Leaky Cauldron usually proved fruitful when looking to gain any sort of information.

Just as he was about to leave the house, a hooting noise stopped him dead in his tracks. As he detached the note from the owl's talon, his heart skipped a beat when he recognised the same parchment and seal as before. It was her!


Great! Come over tonight if you want - I'm working late so will be up for a while longer! See you soon...


Relief spread through every fibre of his being. Why had he panicked so much! He let out a small chuckle: he was Harry Potter, the much-celebrated wizard, of course she would want to see him. For a moment he considered sending her a message to tell her it was a little late now: Ginny was in bed after all. This was fleeting however as the urge to see her took over. Checking the address that she had included at the bottom of the letter, he hopped onto his broom and sped away. Realising that he could have apparated pretty much immediately to her place, he shrugged. It was as if he had retreated in his mind several years, which did not seem to bother him at all. It almost seemed like some kind of way of mentally preparing for the gorgeous Cho...

Minutes later he arrived at her door, his heart beating even faster than it ever had. Clearing his throat, he could not prepare himself for the sight that adorned his eyes...

"Hey Harry!" The stunningly beautiful Asian girl squealed as she wrapped her arms around his neck in a warm greeting. Harry felt her sweet perfume soak into his nostrils as his eyes wandered down her tight grey pyjama top and almost-hot pant style pink shorts. Merlin, her legs were so long and beautiful. Her bare feet flexed a little off the ground as she continued to embrace him.

"Er, hey..." Was all he could grunt in response, his vocal facilities almost lost to him, such was his excitement for being this close to her.

She leaned back. "Is Ginny not with you?" She bit her lip slightly, while her cute nose wrinkled.

He shook his head. "No, er....she's...busy..." He replied, sounding somewhat uncertain.

"Well, come in!" She beamed at him, leading him through to the living room. As she sat down next to him, he felt his eyes locked into hers...now that he was actually with her, he had no earthly idea of what to say!

A few seconds or so of awkward silence continued until Cho coughed slightly. "So...how come you got in touch with me? No offence, I mean...it was just such a nice surprise!" She said in her sexy, Northern accent.

Harry stared back, not sure how to respond. Should he be honest with her or make up something?
12132211.title: No - Harry doesn't want Ginny to know a thing!

choices: Cho is not impressed - how could he do this to Ginny!
Cho is pleased: thank Merlin's beard for that!
121322112.content:
Gazing at the gorgeous Cho, Harry felt his mouth become dry. "Well, I um. I wanted. Er..." It was no use - any chance of lying his way out of this seemed to simply melt away.

"What is it Harry?" She said curiously, her head cocking sideways as she leaned a little towards him on the couch.

"I can't help it!" He blurted out of her, making her look immediately startled and wide-eyed. "I can't stop thinking about you Cho! Ever since my wedding. I - I..." He gulped in some much-needed air. "I just think you're so beautiful and amazing..." He stopped again, seeing how the effect of his words would sink in.

He hadn't planned to do this, though to be fair he hadn't really thought as far ahead as this point! All he had wanted was to see her; now that he declared his feelings for her, how would she react.

Cho continued to stare at him, her expression unreadable. A few more moments of this was unbearable!

"Please - say something!" He gulped at her, finding himself bending forwards as if he were pleading with her. "Cho...just...please!"

Cho folded her arms, leaning back against the arm of her couch, her long, bare legs. crossing over as her toes wiggled, almost teasingly at him. Normally, a woman's foot or toes would gross Harry out, but with Cho EVERYTHING was simply divine!

"Well, Harry. What can I say...?" She stated softly. Allowing some silence to hang in the air, Harry began to babble at her again but she held out a graceful hand in front of his face to silence him. "Ssh. Now, as I was saying..."

She paused, staring right at him as if to measure the impact her imminent words would have on him. The suspense was killing him...!
121322112.title: Unable to hide the truth!

choices: Harry meekly apologises and goes back home to Ginny
He can't leave his wand for a week! He begs her to have it back!
Harry decides to try to overpower her!
1213221121.content:
Cho's dark eyes narrowed as she shook her head from side to side.

"So you thought I'd just roll over and be grateful that you've decided you like me?" She said with anger building in her voice. "And what about Ginny - your wife?" She finished incredulously.

The Boy Who Lived wished that he hadn't have declared his feelings towards to Cho so soon: it had clearly backfired. "Please, Cho. It's not like that. I mean," He paused, trying to force himself to sound something resembling coherence. "Ginny and I....it's...complicated."

"Complicated? What's complicated about you planning to cheat on your wife?" Cho seethed at her ex boyfriend from years ago.

"I...um..." What could he say? If he admitted to Cho that he didn't love his wife, would that antagonise her, help to explain himself a bit better. It was becoming abundantly clear that Harry had made a grave error in professing his love for the Asian Scot. "Look, I'm sorry, Cho. Please - I'll, I'll just go." He said awkwardly, shuffling to his feet, wishing desperately that he hadn't have come over to see Cho tonight.

"Hey!" Cho used one of her long legs to force Harry backwards, sending a spark of pleasure to shoot through him, despite the tense situation. "You owe me an explanation! Do you really think, just because you're the famous Harry Potter that you have the right to cheat on your wife, and expect every girl to fall at your feet?"

Harry's eyes flickered down at the mention of this last word, noticing the white, glossy varnish adorning her feet. What could he do to resolve this? Before he could react, Cho's hand moved like a blur as she pointed her wand directly at him...

"Expelliarmus!" She yelled at Harry, catching him by surprise and knocking him backwards so that he tumbled off the end of the couch, hitting the ground with a thud! Being at such close range to him, his wand was wrenched from his trouser pocket with such speed, that he was more than impressed to see Cho grab it as it hurtled toward her.

"What...what the...!" Harry gasped, the wind knocked out of his sails as he lay sprawled on the ground.

Cho stood over him, her arms folded and a menacing air about her. "You really think you can do whatever you want, just because you're the Harry Potter. Well guess what, that doesn't work with me!"

"Please, please!" He groaned up at her, feeling a thumping pain in the back of his head where it had come into contact with the floor.

"Here's what's going to happen. You're going to apologise for coming over here, with whatever perverted reasons you had. Then you're going home to your wife. Then I'll send this," Cho waved his wand - the same one that he had disarmed from Draco Malfoy just a couple of years ago - above him, "I'll send this back to you."

"My-my wand!" He murmured. A wizard without a wand was like a bird without wings, or a fish without fins.

"You heard me. Lousy, cheating scumbags like you don't deserve wands. Go a whole week without it, devoting yourself to Ginny completely - and I'll find out if you have or not, and I'll let you have this back." Cho said disdainfully down to him.

"Now what do you have to say to me?" She raised an eyebrow expectantly at him. Her face, though it was wearing a stern expression, still looked utterly gorgeous to him. "Ready to apologise to me, Harry?"
1213221121.title: Cho is not impressed at all!

choices: A week goes by and Harry gets his wand back!
He can't cope without his wand...back to Cho's the next day!
12132211212.content:
For a fleeting moment, he considered tackling her down and regaining his wand by force. But there were three powerful factors that prevented him from doing so: Cho had two wands and he had none; the pain in his head was pretty intense; gazing up at the stunning raven-haired beauty, he found himself far too weak in her presence to attempt anything physical.

Forcing himself forward, he immediately felt disorientation take over, causing him to crash back down on the ground, at her feet.

"Please," Harry murmured pitifully. "Please, not my wand...!"

"I told you that I want an apology," She stated coldly, clearly unimpressed with him.

He raised his head up, just enough to look down at the tops of the Asian girl's bare feet. "I'm b-begging you. Don't take my wand!" Harry couldn't take it any more as he sank back down to the floor, his mouth pressed onto the silky smooth skin of Cho's foot.

"Are you really that pathetic? I mean, telling me how you're obsessed with me, even though you're married...now you're lying on the ground at my feet, begging me for your wand... Is this the same Harry Potter who defeated You Know Who?" She sighed, almost sounding flabbergasted.

"Sorry," Harry replied meekly, his lips pressed against the top of her foot still, neither of which were budging from the floor. Without really meaning to, he found his lips forming an 'O' shape so that he pressed them lightly against her skin.

"Now you're kissing my feet? Wow you really have changed since I last knew you." With that she wrenched her feet away from him, leaving him face down on the carpet. "And that was your apology I take it? Just leave, Harry. I've seen more than enough of you." She turned away, kneeling down on the floor so that she could reach for something that had fallen down the side of the couch.

As she did so, she exposed her bare soles to him. Lifting his head up, he was met with the sight of both bare soles, upside down to him, just a few inches from his face. "Please, please! He grovelled up at her. Please, Cho. Please can I have my wand back?" He felt the pain in his head start to subside, giving him enough strength to lean back so that he was kneeling before her.

Cho ignored him as she continued searching down the side of the couch.

"Please!" He called up at her, his voice finding some of its previous authority.

She turned round to look at him. "Really? Still here? What's it going to take to get rid of you? Do I need to obliviate you, help you forget about your creepy little obsession with me?" She said this with disdain, though Harry was sure he could see a little bit of excitement flash in her eyes.

"No, no not that!" Harry hadn't considered this before: it wouldn't negate the antipathy that he felt towards his relationship with Ginny.

"Oh do you want to kiss my foot again?" She said mockingly, laughing at Harry as she lifted a bare foot and placed it just in front of his face.

Staring at her soft, slightly wrinkled sole, Harry gulped. He had never been into feet before, but this was not the first time that he had looked at Cho's foot and admitted privately that it was not unattractive.

"Fine - if you kiss it again, will that get rid of you?" She chuckled at him; for the first time she showed some kind of sign that she might have been enjoying this.

"Um...but my wand," Harry stared up at her imploringly, knowing that she called all the shots. His options were dwindling rapidly: it seemed as though he would have to leave, by force or by his own volition. The only offer on the table was a kiss on the bare sole of Cho Chang.

"You're not getting your wand," she told him firmly. "One more chance: you can kiss my foot before I let you go. Or I'm going to have to start using MY wand...!"

He knew he was beaten. Any contact with Cho was something that he could not refuse: he arched his head up so that his lips were on the centre of her soft, pale sole. He felt a damp, musty, but not altogether unpleasant smell fill his nostrils as he pressed his lips forward. "Please...?" He whimpered one more time, but the movement of his lips had sealed his fate: his kiss was completed and Cho was now determined to get him out.

Forcing her foot forward, Harry felt her toes brush against his nose as he was sent flat on his back. Standing over him, Cho held both wands in her hands. "OK, which spell shall I use to get you out of here...?" As she flicked her hand backwards, and began to say "Loco..." Her voice trailed off as he rolled to his side and scurried towards the door.

Shame and humiliation washed over him as he realised how pathetic a display that was: begging and pleading with her, kissing her foot...would she ever be able to take him seriously again? And the worst part, she clearly despised him for the fact that he was married and had these feelings for her! Hopping onto his broom, he headed back home, preparing for a week without his wand...
12132211212.title: Begging and a foot kiss or two!

121322112122.content:
Waking up with a start, Harry felt sweat drip down from his brow. It was a sense of loss, a feeling of having something vital missing. How could he have given up his wand so easily? At least Ginny didn't seem to have noticed anything, he mused. When he returned to bed, she hadn't even stirred, and at one point apologised for waking him!

It wasn't the only thing fresh on his mind. He was dreaming of the events that had just taken place with Cho: in one scenario she had actually been delighted with his revelation and had reciprocated his feelings! Just when he was about to make out with her, her lips were replaced with her bare foot, which he still found himself pressing his lips eagerly against. For the next couple of hours, Harry Potter tried futilely to think about other things other than Cho Chang and his wand. He even thought about her feet! At least it took his mind off his wand...

"Morning," Ginny mumbled as Harry lay awake, feeling absolutely shattered with the broken sleep he'd had. As she busied herself with putting the kettle on for a cup of tea, he could think of only one way round this: he had to go back to Cho's!

Of course, this was an incredibly risky option: she had made her feelings more than plain last night, but he simply had to get his wand back. Admittedly, the idea of just being around her again did seem rather wonderful. Then again, his utter patheticness last night filled him with more than a little trepidation. The defining image of Harry Potter: pleading at Cho Chang's feet and kissing them...is that something the history books would include?

Resolving to cast aside his amorous feelings for Cho and focus purely instead on getting his wand back, he made a hasty goodbye to his wife - an excuse of seeing Hagrid - and hopped onto his broom.

"Why don't you just apparate over?" Ginny asked him, observing him shrewdly with a cup of tea in her hand as they both stood in the front garden.

Of course he couldn't tell her about his wand...that would only complicate things beyond measure! "I just like it, you know. Plus, Hagrid likes seeing me on it too," Harry replied casually before taking off, ensuring that he went in the direction of Hagrid's, should Ginny still be watching.

Taking a sharp turn when he was up in the clouds, he arrived at the Asian Scot's within minutes. Lowering himself down towards the roof of the house, he noticed that one of the windows was open. A new plan instantly began to hatch inside his head...it was still early: maybe he could sneak in and retrieve the wand without her knowing! Could he really do something that sneaky; what if she found out....?
121322112122.title: Back to Cho's the next morning!

choices: Conjure an identical-looking wand: Transfiguration time!
Alter Cho's memory: that would solve a lot of problems!
Make it look like there had been a burglary!
1213221121221.content:
This was almost too easy! Aiming his Firebolt downwards enough so he could reach the ledge by her window, Harry steadied himself before peering through her window...

She was still asleep! His heart rate increasing, both the sight of the object of his affections as well with the fact that he could get in unnoticed, he gingerly looped one leg over the gap, then the other. Cho looked completely peaceful: her entire body was angled to one side and one hand was squeezing her pillow. The Boy Who Lived noticed the grey top she was wearing was the same as before...he wondered what else she was wearing...

Forcing himself away from such thoughts, he tiptoed through the room, his eyes darting around furiously for his wand. It wasn't anywhere obvious, so he subtly crept past her, into the bathroom but to no avail. Then he headed downstairs, quieter than a mouse. Soon, he was back in the living room: the place where he had grovelled so pathetically before her last night.

It didn't take him long to find it: there it was on a coffee table beside the couch. A blissful feeling spread inside him: thank Merlin for that! Grabbing it and tucking it inside his coat pocket, Harry prepared to exit: he could just sneak out the front door now!

However, something stopped him.

No, it wasn't Cho: it was the sinking realisation that she would find out he had retrieved his wand! She would notice it gone in a second. A light bulb flicked on inside his head: what if he conjured up an identical replacement wand...then again, he had never been an expert at transfiguration. Or he could creep upstairs, alter Cho's memory: including the details of his visit last night...

Then again, he could just plead ignorance and play dumb: someone else could have stolen the wand! He could even break a couple of things, just to make it look like there had been some sort of burglary...

What did Harry decide to do?
1213221121221.title: Sneaking Into Cho's!

12132211212212.content:
Surely, altering Cho's memory was the most logical and efficient way to deal with this problem. Two owls with one stone: he would have his wand back with no questions asked, and he would remove his humiliating display from yesterday.

So, after creeping up the stairs, Harry stood over the gorgeous Asian Scot. He wished that he could slip in under the covers to join her, but that was an idea that would definitely not go well. A rash, impulsive crossed his mind: if he was going to adjust her memory anyway, maybe he could have a little fun first...?

It went against his better moral judgement; he couldn't even blame it on the dark side of him embedded in him from Voldemort. This was Harry Potter being a slave to his own passion.

"Petrificus Totalus!" He yelled at her suddenly, pointing his wand directly at her sleeping body, which became instantly stiff. Was this wrong? Well, it clearly was but he just couldn't resist! Wrenching the light blue covers off her bed, he let out a small murmur of pleasure at the sight of Cho's tight pink pants and long, luscious legs. His eyes wandering downwards, he noticed her bare feet, scrunched up so that the cute wrinkles were even more pronounced than before.

He stood over her, for at least a couple of minutes, almost soothed by the sight of something this glorious and beautiful. Her eyes were still closed...was she even aware of what was going on? He had never tried that spell on someone asleep before. A pang of guilt began to spread inside of him: OK, he was going to Obliviate her anyway, but this was really taking advantage of an innocent woman. This wasn't him: he was decent, kind. Quickly putting her covers back over her, he gently performed the spell to negate her stiff state, before preparing to change her memory...

Cho's eyes bolted wide open. "What the...? How did ye? Harry, jeez!" Cho said, her eyes wide with fear and incredulity.

"Wait...I," Harry babbled, scrambling around with his wand to perform the Obliviate spell. He froze, his eyes meeting hers. Feeling almost lost in them, his hesitation gave her enough time to begin reaching around for something. It dawned on him - she was about to use her wand!

Trying to focus his mind, Harry Potter pointed his wand directly at his target...

121322112122123.content:
"Wait, wait Cho!" Harry's wand let off several sparks, causing the black-haired beauty to stop retrieving her wand. She glared at him, her dark eyes full of loathing.

"I canny believe ye!" She said, her Scottish accent almost more pronounced than usual, such was her clear loss of composure. "Ye come into me room...Harry you're unbelievable! Ye do a curse on me...yeah I could feel the duvet come off me...you're sick!"

With that, she launched forward and crashed her bare foot sharply into his testicles, forcing him to crumple instantly downwards so that his face dropped onto the end of her bed, his arms flailing.

Cho wasted no time, grabbing his wand, which had slipped from his hand. She held both this and her own over him, stood up on her bed and towering imperiously over him. All Harry Potter could do was moan in agony as hot tears sprang from his eyes: Cho's foot had found its target well. His groin felt as though a sack of potatoes had squashed and crushed against it! The pain was so much that he found himself flapping like a fish out of water. Before he could move, Cho used a bare foot to press firmly on his head, his nose scrunched painfully into her duvet cover.

"Did'n ye learn from last night?" She said angrily, her foot grinding down so hard that Harry felt his breathing become rather restricted.

"Mmmmmfff!" Was the only noise he was capable of making at this point.

"How did ye get yer wand?" She said a little more calmly, but still with more than a dollop of menace. At this point she let off him enough so that he could arch his head up and gratefully inhale some oxygen into his lungs.

In broken tones, he told her everything. He was in so much pain that he didn't dare deviate from the truth; he simply hoped that she would take some pity on him.

"So youse were gonna change me memory? That's sick. You're sick, Harry Potter!"

What could he say: he had acted like a total scumbag. Coughing and spluttering, he attempted to plead with her. "Please Cho...I'm sorry..."

"Save it, creep!" Cho used her bare foot to flick Harry off the edge of her bed, much like one would do to get rid of something unpleasant from the end of their shoe.

Harry found himself sprawled on the ground, staring up at the ceiling. At least the pain in his nether regions was starting to subside.

"You're really not givin' up, are ye?" Cho called down at him, sitting on the end of her bed now, her legs crossed and swinging just over him. She was right: even after yet another humiliating experience, he still wanted her, still yearned for her.

"I...I love you, Cho," He said simply, feeling an almost cathartic effect from speaking the words that he knew to be true for months now, years really if he were completely honest.

Cho studied him carefully. It was almost as if she was thinking carefully about what she wanted to do with him. For the first time since yesterday evening, before he professed his feelings for her, she seemed to be looking at him with something other than disgust. Was it....curiosity?

"How much do ye love me?" She said bluntly. Gazing up at this Asian Goddess, Harry felt one of the toes from her swinging feet brush lightly against his lips. Just the merest touch from her made him feel so happy, so right. He let out a small moan of pleasure before deciding how best to answer her...
121322112122123.title: Trying To Reason With Cho...

choices: Harry gathers what's left of his dignity and gets out as quickly as possible!
Despite everything he still can't resist her: he kisses her feet again!
1213221121221232.content:
The slightly salty taste from one of Cho's toes seemed to awaken a complete submissiveness in him, a desperate need for him to show how much he worshiped her...

Grabbing one of her teasingly swinging feet (causing her to gasp a little in surprise), Harry forced his lips all over the bare sole of Cho, savouring her soothingly soft skin against his mouth, relishing in the damp yet glorious flavour that began to absorb his taste buds. Closing his eyes, he continued this, letting out several moans...this just felt so good!

"Wow...ye really are pathetic!" Cho laughed as she ceased his kisses with her bare sole planted directly over his face: her toes lightly tapping his forehead, while the middle part of her foot squashed against his nose and mouth, which was still wide open. "Harry Potter: The Boy Who Kissed Cho Chang's Feet!"

Embarrassment reddened his cheeks, yet he lay there completely powerless; through the gaps in her toes he could make out her gorgeous face, her dark eyes so beautiful and wide that they could swallow him whole.

"Pmmeeeasse!" Was all he could meekly make out to her in a muffled voice.

"Please what: please ken ye kiss me feet again?" Cho giggled, standing up so that most of her weight was now crashing down upon him. Harry barely felt the middle of his glasses snap and begin sliding off his face. He was so entranced by her that he did not care, not one iota.

"Harry - I could never love you. I mean - look at ye! When we were teenagers, I thought youse were brave, strong, cute...Now look at ye!" She said harshly, a look of superiority adorning her pretty features.

Harry stayed silent. Up until now she had been not unkind to him, not this brutal at least. What hurt was that she spoke the truth: he was half the man he used to be: lying on the ground and kissing an ex girlfriend's foot. An ex girlfriend's foot who didn't even love him...

Yes, even when she had denied him last night, he was still quietly confident that she loved him deep down. I mean, he was the famous Harry Potter! She had been so keen to be in touch with him...he really thought that this could be a way out of his unhappy marriage with Ginny! And here she was, standing on his face, making it abundantly clear that she didn't even love him.

"And not only that, but youse a married man! You don't deserve Ginny, you weirdo!" She laughed gently, almost spitefully.

"Pmmeasse," he moaned up in a small voice.

"Please what? Please tell me I love ye too? It's never gonna happen. You're beneath me Harry Potter: literally!"

He felt his heart breaking into pieces, yet he was too weak: physically and emotionally to even attempt wresting her foot off his face. Finally the Asian Scot stepped off him, resting her feet on the floor. Looking past her, into a mirror, he could see his blotchy, reddened face. Cho had pressed so hard with her foot that he could actually see the imprint of her sole on his face. Too ashamed to even meet her eye, he averted her gaze, wishing that he had never come here. Again!

"Harry Potter: The Boy Who Kissed Cho Chang's Feet!" Cho repeated, letting out a sigh, as if out of pity. "In case I haven't made meself clear: the only part of me youse gonna get is me feet. Is that clear to ye?"

Cho grinned as she lifted her bare feet over his face again, winking at him. It seemed crystal clear to him. He knew what to do...
1213221121221232.title: Kissing Cho's Bare Sole!

It's too much humiliation: he makes a hasty exit without his wand.
12132211212212321.content:
Cho's complete and utter dismissal of him had made him feel increasingly dejected. Dejected and a little angry, it must be said. Not that he had the temerity to do anything right now, other than awkwardly shift back up to his feet.

When his eyes met hers, he felt his cheeks redden once more. "Sorry..." He mumbled reluctantly. He really felt like telling her that he was Harry Potter, not The Boy Who Kissed Her Feet, but the vanquisher of Voldemort, the restorer of peace...

"Save it." She grinned a little mischievously at him. "I know the real Harry Potter now, aye. I canny wait to get meself a mention in yer autobiography one day. Or maybe it will be ye getting a mention in mine!"

"Please, please don't tell anyone about this..." He murmured, his eyes fixed on the ground, such was his shame. Why, why, why had he allowed his love for Cho consume him to the point that he had carried out such pathetic a display...?

"Youse in no position to tell me what I can do," she said firmly. "Now get yourself out of here."

He hobbled away, his head hung in shame. Still thinking about what he could to restore some sort of pride, it seemed futile. He was beneath her: she would never love him - not now, not ever. Being the famous Harry Potter had no stroke, no bargaining power around her. The kisses on her bare sole seemed to confirm that to the both of them.

"Oh, my wand..." He stopped in his tracks, remembering that she was back in possession of this.

Her nose crinkled as she viewed him with amusement. "Nearly forgot, eh? Ye can have it. If...if," She paused here as if savouring the moment. "If ye kiss my feet. And thank me."

This was almost too much for Harry. Sensing his cheeks turn a beetroot red, he looked imploringly at her. She ignored him as she grabbed his wand from her bed and walked slowly over to him, a playful look about her.

Surely he couldn't do it again, not with the knowledge that she considered him a nothing, a worm. Could he really allow himself to be humiliated again?

Cho kept walking until she stopped at the end of her bed, then slipped down so she was sitting on the edge once more, her legs crossing over seductively so one bare foot dangled a good few inches or so off the ground. She pointed her finger downwards: in no uncertain terms she wanted Harry to be on the floor again, under her foot.

He shifted around awkwardly: he wanted his wand back, but enough to kiss her foot again. A knowing smirk was on her face, as if she knew what he would do...

He simply had to get his wand back. Plus he had to grudgingly admit that a submissive part of him felt drawn to her foot again.

Dropping to his knees, Cho's grin widened as he knelt down and placed his lips on top of her foot, planting a kiss, which he left to linger for several second. Looking up at her, her look of triumph made him feel conflicted: in some ways, this was hot - getting to be in physical contact with Cho, even though it was her foot. Simultaneously, he felt so ashamed, so degraded that he was actually doing this.

What would his parents say if they could see if right now? What would Sirius or Remus make of this pathetic show? Lord Voldemort himself would be beside himself, knowing that the Great Harry Potter was nothing more than putty in the hands - and feet - of Cho Chang!

"There you go!" Cho beamed at him, handing his wand over. "Now run yeself back to Ginny. Her feet will need some kissin' too!" She giggled and leant back on her bed. This was too much for Harry: before he said anything that he'd regret he scurried out of the room, a nauseating feeling inside of him.

That was the worst that it could possibly have gone!

The only saving grace was that he'd got his wand back. However, the utter shame that he thought was only accentuated by the fact that Cho Chang was not interested in him. Quite the opposite: her words still echoed inside him...

Irrational as it seemed, the only conceivable way to deal with the Cho situation was to see her. Straighten things out and try to find some peace with the predicament he was in.

Plus, he had seen spells and potions to remove lustful feelings go awry before. What if something happened to cause him permanent damage? He wasn't prepared to take that risk! There was something else too....the way Cho had spoke to him, the harshness of her words had been out of order. Okay, he had been pathetic and acted like a creep in front of her, but he was still Harry Potter! If it hadn't been for him she would probably not even be alive today! She had basically thrown the love he declared for her right back in his face.

Determined to start as he meant to go on, he knocked firmly on the door. Some of this evaporated the instant he saw he gorgeous, slender frame, her big, dark eyes...

"Harry!" A surprised and amused expression was on her face. Her black fringe bounced a little just above her eyes.

"Hi Cho," he breathed back. "I've come to see you, if that's okay?"

"That depends: are ye looking to kiss me feet again?" She giggled gently, the cute freckles on her nose disappearing as her nose crinkled.

He started to blush but pressed on. "No...no. I just wanted to talk. Can I come in?"

Harry was relieved when Cho allowed him to come in and take a place next to her on the couch. He could not help but admire how elegant she even looked: even in a black sweater and jeans. He also noticed that she was barefoot again...trying to shake that away from his mind, he attempted to make amends.

"Look Cho, I'm...really sorry. What I did a few days ago: coming over to yours and saying...what I said. Being a married man....it was all totally out of order. I am sorry," He said as reasonably as he could manage.

She stared at him, flicking her black shining hair back a little. "Ye should be sorry. You're Harry Potter: the Harry Potter. I used to look up to ye, even after we dated, like." She said a little awkwardly. "I won't lie: I kinda hoped that when youse came back to Hogwarts, after the battle with You-Know-Who, that you'd like, wanna spend some time with me."

A sightly resentful expression adorned her face. However this was swiftly replaced with one of amusement: the same, familiar ones from their last meeting and his dreams ever since. "But now, now..." She burst out laughing. "Sorry...Harry!"

What was this? Here he was doing the honourable decent thing by apologising, even though she had spoken to him like a piece of dirt before, and what did she do...laugh?! He had even started to feel some hope returning when she mentioned his return to Hogwarts several years ago. That had vanished the instant she started laughing.

Cho had to clutch her ribs to control herself and wipe several tears away with a dainty hand. "Harry, I'm sorry. I can't help it: whenever I look at ye now, all I can picture is your face: under me foot!"

He felt himself go scarlet. "I've apologised," he said thickly, wishing that she could just let it go.

"Yeah, you also said "please" enough times as well, though that were obscured by me foot!" She giggled.

"What do you want me to say?" Harry said, detecting some desperation creeping into his voice.

"Have ye been kissin' Ginny's feet too?" She said, winking at him and lifting her legs up so that her long, jean clad legs extended out and rested on his, her bare feet in his lap.

Harry didn't know what to do: he couldn't force her off him - anything to risk pissing her off was a no-no! He tried to talk to her but she ignored him.

"Been missin' me feet eh? Is that why youse came over? Give 'em a rub, if yer's really sorry..." She grinned at him, scrunching her pretty toes on his lap...

Then Harry went to the drawing-room of his faculty. He needed to digest all that had happened and rest before tomorrow's test.
And then the day "X" came. Participants of the Tournament stood in a special tent, waiting for the organizers, and the crowd buzzed and rustled there, in the stands around the arena, where the champions had to fight the dragon. Harry was staring at Fleur with all his might. She was impeccable: the silver curls of her hair were gathered into a neat tail, and she herself was dressed in a brand-new blue sports suit. The only thing that seemed a little strange to Harry, was that she was wearing old and fairly worn running shoes on her feet. However, Potter had no time to be surprised, the organizers appeared to give the participants the honor to choose a dragon, with which students would have to fight. Five minutes passed and the dragons were chosen. Fleur went to the arena first. The fight took half an hour, but Harry felt that it lasted forever. He shuddered from every dragon's roar and the shout of the crowd.
He believed that Fleur would surely cope, but he was still very worried about her. But the trial was over and Fleur, still as beautiful as always, but slightly disheveled and sweating, went into the tent, proudly holding a golden egg in her hands. Passing by Harry, she whispered softly: "I'll meet you today at 8 in the broomstick cot near the Quidditch pitch." Now Harry knew that he would be able to pass the first trial, no matter what. Even Lord Voldemort himself if suddenly he decides to protect the golden egg can not thwart Harry to go on a date with Fleur.
After a long and exhausting battle with the fire-breathing monster, Harry managed to get a damn egg, and with a sense of accomplishment went to celebrate, dreaming about the moment when he again can see Fleur.
By eight o'clock he was standing by a small lodge where brooms were kept. The door to it was ajar and a soft yellow light from the kerosene lamp poured into the street from a small crack. Harry waited a little to get courageous and entered the cot.
Fleur was sitting on a bench, lit by a pleasant light dancing behind a glass lamp. The flames fervently frolicked in her azure eyes and gently stroked her silvery curls. Weila was dressed in a light jacket and light trousers, and on her feet she had all the same sneakers in which she performed at the tournament. Fleur beckoned to Harry, inviting him to sit beside her. When he settled himself on the corner of the bench, she spoke: "Remember, zen, at the owlery before the first trail, you said you were ready to fulfill all my desires?"
Fleur looked Harry in the eye. He swallowed convulsively, paused for a second, then nodded confidently. The veela's face was lit up by a dazzling smile, exposing her snow-white, neat teeth. She continued: "If zis iz true, can you swear it?"
The silence lasted a minute, and then Harry said one single word that determined his fate.
— I swear it!—
Immediately, they were seized with a blue glow, a moment later extinguished. Potter looked inquiringly at Fleur. She smiled and decided to explain to the unlucky teenager what he had just done.
— You zee... You yourself, wizout realizing it, made a magical contract wiz me, swearing allegiance. Now you will be obligated to carry out all my orders, whezer you like it or not. In any case, magic will force you. And, to tell the trus, I always treated you as a humble servant, and not as a boy-friend. At the end of the day you are just a stupid child.
Harry with tears in his eyes looked at Fleur sitting in front of him. How could he have been so deceived? But Hermione told him, she warned him that Fleur needed something from him ... How could he have been so naive, and believe that this veela would really love him?
But the flow of his not the most pleasant thoughts was interrupted by the voice of his enslaver.
1541.title: During tri wizard tournament, male student
