15411.content:
— Well, zince everzhing has worked out so well, perhaps I should give you your first task. Today was a very busy day and I spent a lot of time on my feet. I zink you should take a little care of my zore soles.
She stretched out her leg, and Harry, seized by some force, without even noticing it, was sitting on the floor, with veela's sneakers in front of his face. She looked thoughtfully at the black-haired boy and said slowly: "You know, zeze sneakers I have for the fours year. They are very comfortable and I always use zem for training. But usually I'm so tired zat I just do not have ze strengs to wash them. You should know, I haven't washed zese zings for ages. I just use a charm to keep all the smell in them. I zink now is the best time to put zem in order, but first ... You just have to brease in this divine fragrance."
With her giggling Harry grabs veela's right sneaker and pulls it off. With the removal of her sneaker Potter was instantly assaulted with a foot odor that made him cough. It smelled of sweat, foul cheese, perhaps a small hint of something else Harry couldn't place. Point being he was assaulted by this odor and began gagging. Fleur noticed this and giggled: "I wore them all the time without socks just for you Mr. Potter! Now it's time to smell the inside," — she grins.
The leather bottom of her reeking sneaker is torn and ripped, and coated with sweat. Harry put his head into the sneaker and took a small sniff. It was terrible. It had the stench of moldy cheese dipped in vinegar.
"Do you like it little boy? How's it smell, huh?"
Harry whimpered, "It's horrible Fleur... Please, don't make me do this, it's so revolting!"
"Shush, zere! It's only the beginning. Now sniff louder and harder!"
She sticks Harry's head down into the sneaker. He feels the heat eminating from deep within. He sniffed loudly and gagged on the stench. The insole reeks of rubber and sweat and lots of wear. The odor had effectively doubled in strength and left Harry shuddering. The cruel veela laughed as the boy coughed and nearly lost what he had in his stomach.
"Keep smelling it, you, pasetic kid!"
The young Potter sniffed and sniffed and sniffed. His eyes watered and his chest began to hurt as he inhaled the semi-toxic fumes of veela's worn sneaker.
"Now start licking zat dirty insole..." A cruel smile spreads across Fleur's face as she said this but Harry doesn't get the pleasure of seeing that with his nose deep in a stinky prison and his eyes pressed against the tongue of her sneaker.
"Are you enjoying that 'Arry? Do you remember zat you promised me to do everysing I ask? Now you have such an opportunity. " Fleur whispers as she painfully presses Potter's face down into her sneaker.
Slowly Harry poke his tongue out and let it touch down on the slightly damp interior of Fleur's sneaker... The taste overwhelms the tip of his tongue faster than he could have thought possible and an effort made on himself he has pressed whole tongue flat against the sole of her sneaker. Right as Harry reached the disgusting toeprints in the front of Fleur's sneaker he licked up all the sweat, dirt, and who knows what else and swallowed it with disgust. Fleur watched until she saw Harry start to grow faint.
"MMmmmmMmmmmMMmMMM!" — Harry's mumble of discomfort, rolls out from the back of his throat.
Finally Fleur put her sneaker on the floor near the bench and took off the second one. Her pale slender foot slips out of the malodorous sneaker, bare and very white with slightly tan soles. Harry's eyes starts watering again from the feminine feet odor.
Harry with beg in his eyes looks at the veela holding the funky nasty sneaker. With tears he cries: "Please, I can't endure this anymore! Those shoes reek like hell!"
"Hm? You don't like my sneakers?" — Fleur asks with a curious smile. "Zan, I guess, zat it's time you to smell my tired feet."
With that said, Fleur lifts up her bare feet so that her long quite dingy soles were directly in front of Harry's cringing face and wiggles her toes. Once again, a raunchy, musty stench dominated his nostrils, making him rather discombobulated. The smell from veela's feet is atrocious and reminds him of across between stale cheese popcorn and vinegar. Fleur places her toes on Harry's nose. He jump back and start coughing. Harry can see the perspiration on Fleur's feet and it makes him sick. Her feet were hot, ridiculously foited, and dirty. They stank horribly, he thought, gagging at the putrid scent.
She smiles as her pinky toes winding up stretched tightly over Potter's face. Harry's nose is squeezed between two of Fleur's slicky and sweaty toes. She starts flexing her nasty toes and rubbing Potter's face with them. The veela shove young hero's face into the moist skin. The calloused ridge of her big toe dug into his skin as bits of grime and beads of sweat covered his lips. Harry's face has become slick with Fleur's salty sweat and toe jam is being forced into his nose. Still, this was nothing compared to what was to come...
"God it feels so good to rub my toes all over your face 'Arry, — she says excitedly, — I can't imagine how nice zat would be to feel your tongue pressed against my sole."
Harry without other chances pulled out his tongue and started licking the salty tasting sweat from Fleur de Lacour's disgusting feet groaning in displeasure as he does so. Placing his tongue against the middle of her putrid smelling sole, his tastebuds were completely violated by the ridiculous salty sour flavour. It was even worse than the smell! Intensely acrid, vinegary tastes bounced and danced nastily all over his tongue. After a couple more licks, he was doing everything in his powers to refrain from vomiting. He passed his tongue on every wrinkle, remebering all the time the stench of her feet. It was like swallowing down a piece of brie that been left out in the sun for hours! Beyond repulsive! His eyes, which creased in disgust, along with a slight recoiling of his mouth, only made Fleur push her foot forward, her toes casually spreading over his face. Because of the pressure Harry was forced to open his mouth and when that was done Fleur stuck her sweat drenched foot in it. The taste was awful and disgusting. Harry could feel the sweat slide down the foot and into his mouth. Fleur was enjoying his servile mouth on her feet. It was both restful and even... sensual. It didn't bother her that he was a young teenager, it made her feel good and that was all she cared about. The boy finished her first foot and then went on o the second. When he completed the task he moved his head away from the still foul smelling feet of his cruel goddess.
"Oh, zat was so relakzing! — Fleur dreamily purred, — But you forgot ze most delicious part." After a little giggle she gives Harry a new order: "Now, tze great boy-who-lived, I want you to suck my toes. Be sure to lick out and swallow any of ze gunk you find between zem."
Harry quailed at the command but knew that he can't resist it. The salty vinegar like taste of her toes made him sick to his stomach. Harry bit back a whimper and took one big toe into his mouth and began to suck it scrubbing and eating all the gunk under her nails. He gagged pathetically at the nauseating taste. He sucked on each toe for about 30 seconds before moving on to the next one. When the veela's toes were covered in his saliva, it was time for him to lick in-between them. And Harry's tongue began it's journey in-between those toes in front of Potter's face . As his tongue reachs in, it feels different, somehow — Harry feels the excessive sweat there, that hasn't had the chance to dry up yet, absorbing itself into his mouth. It makes The teenager retch in disgust, but he knows he must push his tongue further in. And then, he feels something. It feels like a rubbery material of sorts. Harry leans back to see what he's found. He splits up veela's pretty if not smelly toes and gags in disgust. His find was the cheese that has been accumulating between them, and as soon as he sees it's yellowish color and it's smell starts hitting him in the face, he couldn't help but vomited.
Fleur glanced at him angrily and asked: "What does zat mean, you, little freak?!"
Harry mumbled: "Fleur, please... That gunk in-between your toes is just too revolting. I can't stand it, I...
15411.title: it's time to worship that feet

154112.content:
"Shut up your mouth, my "hero of Great Britain". You will lick, chew and swallow every bit of it, understood?!" — Fleur was really upset due to the behavior of her servant.
"But, please, I can't..." — Harry tried to protest but Fleur rudely interrupted him, — "I said you're going to chew and swallow all ze gunk you find! I don't care if you like it or not. You could just swallowed it quietly and be done, but now as ze punishment you'd have to eat each peace of zat dump mass between my toes slowly and zoroughly to feel every shade of its flavor and taste!"
Harry cried. He couldn't resist the direct order and he slowly leaned closely to the fetid sole, stuck out his tongue... and took the first peace of the foot cheese in his mouth. After he hawked the taste he was about to vomit again. He gagged but continued to chew. That was the worst thing he ever tasted. Harry couldn't believe that such a beautiful creature as veela can produce such a horrible thing. Harry couldn't even swallow the dump mass because he was ordered not to. So he chewed it for about 20 second gagging each time and only than he felt that he can finally swallow the nauseous mass. But that was only the beginning. Harry had nine more peaces to eat... But Fleur didn't give him the opportunity to finish his work. She came up with an idea how to make this situation even more humiliating. The veela flicked her wand and a small silver spoon appeared.
— Now you are going to collect all ze remaining junk in zis spoon and put it in your filsy mouth in one fell swoop. — Fleur grinned evilly.
That was too much. Harry couldn't have done that in his own will. He even tried to fight the charm and he managed to successfully do this for a minute but than he was broken. He have done what Fleur had ordered him to do. He slowly collected all the foul putrid funky yellow peaces in the spoon and than sent it to his mouth. The taste was disgustingly awful, sour, bitter and salty at the same time... Harry hated that taste, but he had no choice but to chew the filthy grime.
He couldn't stand it any more. He gagged. Than again and again . He couldn't endure the cheesy taste but the magic hadn't been giving him a chance neither to spit the gunk out, nor even to swallow it. So he had to play with nauseous mass with his tongue to fully coat his tastebuds with the unspeakably salty, sour, vinegary and devil knows what else flavour. After two minutes gagging and coughing he finally was allowed to swallow the mucky trash.
He being exhausted and panting glanced at Fleur. She though after saying an arrogant "Fe" put her sneakers on and after ordering Harry to clean up the mess left the lodge. Harry was sitting there in a little cot with a putrid scent in his nostrils and a foul flavor in his mouth thinking about how much his life has changed and yet will change. He took his wand, casted a cleaning spell and made his way to the Griffindor dormitory.
154112.title: She still makes him to do his work

choices: Harry managed to cancel the charm
1541121.content:
Walking along the corridors of Hogwarts, Harry felt terribly depressed. First, he was forced to participate in a deadly tournament against his will, because of this he was hated by a large half of the school, then he lost his best friend who considered him a liar and now, when everything seemed to begin to settle, the most humiliating experience in his life happened.
Drowned in sad thoughts of his fate, Potter did not notice how he found himself in the living room. The party, organized in honor of his victory in the first trial, has already ended leaving behind a terrible mess.
All the students, vigorously celebrating his success, already got to the bedroom to digest a dense dinner, generously flavored with alcohol. A couple of times stumbled in the dark about someone's dropped chairs Harry climbed into his room, where the tenth dream was already seen by the other four-grade boys. Potter lay down on his bed, glanced with a sigh at Ron, who was snoring on the nearest couch, then covered himself with a blanket and tried to fall into a dream, slipping away from the harsh realities of life.
The next day, Harry woke up late, skipping breakfast. He was awaken by the noise of classmates returning from the dining room.
Ron, forgetting that just a couple of days ago he did not want to hear anything about the "golden boy, who always gets all the glory," patting the black-haired Gryffindor on the shoulder, asked if the newly-baked hero slept well. Harry sat on the bed with a sigh and rubbed his eyes, tiredly staring at his red-haired friend. When it was enough for Potter to recover a little, the events of yesterday struck him with a roaring waterfall. Is that really true? Was this really the case? Or maybe it's just a nightmare, inspired by an excessively large amount of drunk firewhisky?
Harry wanted to believe in the last, but Ron's question about why Harry left the party yesterday, the barely born hope was hacked to the ground. Muttering something illegible about going for a walk, and then drinking tea with Hagrid, Harry went to the bathroom. Refreshed and with his cloth changed, he went down to the general drawing room of the faculty. Looking at the wall clock, he found an arrow on the mark at 12:47 and thanked God that today is Saturday and he win't have to explain to the professors why he was not at the lessons. Seeing Potter in the living room, Ron invited him to play a couple of chess games and Harry nodded absently deciding that this was the best way to kill time and think about what to do now.
Playing this game that he was found, by Hermione returning from the library. After reading a lecture about the fact that the game of chess does not contribute to the successful passing of exams, the young nerd seated two resisting guys for textbooks. After sitting for an hour and a half and thoroughly studying the structure of the hippogriff, the trio went to dinner. Walking along the steps of the ancient castle, Harry reflected on how he would now appear in the Great Hall. After all, there probably will be Fleur, and the devil knows what else will appear in the head of this crazy Veela. All at once she may come up with an idea to humiliate him in front the whole school ... At the thought of it, Harry shuddered. Meanwhile, friends had to overcome the last corridor, before they are under the sky arches of the Great Hall. Entering the banquet room of Hogwarts, Harry fixed his gaze on the floor and was not ready to lift it even for a million galleons. And especially he did not want to look at the Ravenclow table, where, he felt it very well, a pair of azure eyes gazed at him from under long eyelashes. Having sat down at the desk of his faculty, Harry put on his plate all that his hands had reached, not really thinking about the compatibility of dishes, and began his meal.He was distracted by Ron's grunting laughter.
Harry looked inquiringly at his friend, who was laughing, with his finger pointed at Potter's plate: "Harry, I understand everything, yesterday was a crazy day and all that, but the herring with the cake, in my opinion, is already an overkill." Then only Harry noticed that he was making a sandwich of cream pie and salted fish. Embarrassed, he put aside his culinary masterpiece and decided to limit himself to tea and apple strudel. Ron continued to chuckle gaily glancing at the reddened Potter, and Hermione, staring at the gloomy face of the national hero, laid her hand on Harry's shoulder, as a sign of support.
Quickly finishing his strudel and gulping tea, Harry, without looking at anyone, went to the living room. This kind of his behavior lasted until the Christmas holidays. Potter was locked in himself, spending almost all his free time in the bedroom with books, or just lying and looking at the ceiling, leaving the hostel only for meal or to visit the classes. He began to communicate less and less with Ron and Hermione, and this worried his best friends. But to all their questions, Harry answered that he was just worried about the next assignment, and therefore he prefers to spend more time on preparation, rather than on meaningless chatter.
Hermione insistently tried to explain that training and communication can be combined, and that the three of them can prepare more rapidly than him being alone, but Harry only shrugged his shoulders and went to his room to read another book completely incomprehensible for him. Thus, sitting out for days on his own bed, he quite successfully avoided Fleur and did not see Veela ever since that ill-fated day when he signed a magical contract that had changed his life so abruptly.
The very last week before the holidays, the Veela felt somewhat out of place as well. Harry's behavior in the early days of after their "date" she consedered funny. Fleur even thought about whether she should not force the teenager to spend with her all the free from school hours, but the more time passed, the more Veela was worried about the state of young Potter. Being not too impressive with his complexion before, after a last month Harry strongly sank and lost even more weight. He began to miss visits to the dining room, and if he came, he ate very little: a piece of cake or a few sweets with tea.
Fleur felt sorry for this frail black-haired boy. In Sharbathon, a few lessons of the history of magic were devoted to the British Magical War of the 20th century, and the young Veela knew about the sad fate of the Potters family. Previously, she wasn't very worried. But the hero, illuminated by the rays of glory, who killed the terrible Dark Lord with his own spell, was only the image living on the dry pages of the textbook. In life it was not any formidable hero, but an ordinary kid with whom too many bad things happened.
The death of the parents at the hands of the greatest dark magician of our time, the hard life with relatives, about which she was told by the Hogwarts students, constant attacks from the Slytherin faculty, and now her terrible act - it is not surprising that Harry lost all craving for life. There in the house for brooms Fleur could not even think that her behavior will so much affect the adolescent. At that moment it seemed to her usual prank. But now ... She had long wanted to apologize to Potter, but she had no idea how to begin the conversation: Harry scampered away from her, as if from a fire.
This desperate situation, the teachers solved announcing the Holy Ball, which will take start on Christmas Eve. The ball was a traditional and integral part of the Tri-Wizard Tournament. But this time the organizers of the tournament decided to depart somewhat from the canon and granted the right to choose the partner not to the boys, as it traditionally was, but to the girls. From the beginning of this year the Ministry of Magic Sports arranged everything for Fleur in the best way. She was more and more into feeling that this was Divine Providence. Anyway, she now had an excellent excuse to talk calmly with Potter and apologize for not having the best attitude toward him.
The Veela decided to invite him this day already. Fortunately, unlike other girls, Harry won't be able to refuse her because of the contract signed between them. Alas, today she didn't manage to see Potter - he didn't come to the Great Hall, so the Veela completed her plan the next day only, when the black-haired boy went down to dinner.
Seeing him entering into the high gate of the Hogwarts dinner hall, Fleur immediately jumped from her place and lightly, but with a confident gait, rushed to the teenager.
— Monsieur Potter, would you do me ze honor of being my partner at ze ball?
Harry shuddered at the sound of the Veela's voice. Really again? He refused to believe it. What else this beautiful, but such a cruel creature wants to do with him? He looked up and his emerald eyes met the azure eyes of Fleur. He looked at the beautiful face of the Veela, and the more carefully he examined her ideal features, the more he understood how he hated her. He hated this beautiful face, eyes behind long eyelashes, her melodic voice ... Her all entirely and completely.
But Harry could not refuse her. Sighing heavily, he uttered a word he did not want to say.
1541121.title: before the second trial

15411211.content:
With a joyful smile, Fleur elegantly moved to her place, leaving the Dark Lord crusher in a more sombre mood than when he got out of bed. Ron, on the other hand, didn't quite caught what Harry was so worried about. How can you be dissatisfied with the fact that the most beautiful girl in the school invited you to the ball?
— Harry, well, you're weird. I would immediately quit my partner if Fleur would have asked me to be with her at the ball!
From the further lamentations of the redhead, Harry was rescued by Hermione, who actually was Ron's ball partner.Wesley's words seemed so insulting to her that she began to hit the ginger with a weighty volume called "Magic creatures and where they live".
The remaining two weeks before the ball, which for many were the happiest days of life, for Harry turned into a real hell. Not only did he not know how to dance, because of what he had to wander around every day for four hours in a waltz with Professor McGonagall, who decided to teach him this art, so also on the freaking ball he would have to go with a girl whose feet not so long ago he was licking. He would have been better take part at a fight with a dragon a couple more times than he would have gone on this silly feast. But, unfortunately, being the champion Harry had no right to miss this solemn event.
Days before the celebration were passing by unnoticed, and now Harry was arm-in-arm with a hateful Veela, dressed in an elegant dress, https://ibb.co/kPe0ox in a room specially reserved for the tournament participants, where they were briefly instructed about the arrangement. Well, now they have to open a ball. Lined up in pairs in front of the grand doors of the Great Hall, they waited for the signal.
Suddenly, the doors flew open, the waltz played and they went to the middle of the hall decorated for Christmas and began their dance.
Harry tried not to look at Fleur, pretending to follow his feet and count a step, but he distinctly felt a heavy Veela's look on himself. When the music ended, they went to small tables with drinks, standing along the walls of the hall. Fleur took a glass of champagne, and Harry didn't have the courage to lift his gaze from the floor. The Veela first broke the silence.
— You know, I wanted to apologize for making you ... Well, you know ..
— For licking your sweaty feet? — Harry sharply raised his head and looked at Fleur being embarrassed. Her face flooded a faint blush.
— Do you have any ideas how disgusting this was? I think I still have this nasty taste in my mouth!
Harry spoke quite loudly, and Fleur was glad that they were standing at a far table in the very corners of the hall, and thankful to the music of the rock band that replaced the orchestra, hardly anyone could hear their conversation. Meanwhile, Harry continued.
— In front of my eyes, a crazy warlock killed my parents when I was a year-old, then until I was eleven, I played the role of a house elf living with my crazy relatives! I was so glad when I found out that I was a wizard and received a letter from Hogwarts. I thought my life would change, but in the first grade Voldemort himself nearly killed me, and then in the second grade I had to fight with a fifty meter basilisk! And for all that I was rewarded with the pieces of gunk that have accumulated between your toes!
— But 'Arry, zet was just a joke, I didn'tt zink it would act on you like zat ..."
— You know, I sincerely want some crazy asshole to kill your sister Gabrielle before your very eyes! I wish him killing her cruelly, so that you can see in detail all of her suffering! Perhaps then you will understand, you will feel on yourself all the charm of my life, which, even without you being included, looked like someone's evil, silly joke!
And then Harry realized that he had said too much. Fleur's expression sharply changed from confused to very distant and cold. In a voice that didn't foretell Harry anything good she said: "Let's go for a walk in ze garden. I have an assignment for you."
Despite the fact that there was a Christmas night outside, temperature in the garden was warm like in summer. It was maintained by the special charms so that students after the ball could unwind and walk for fun on the green alleys of strange plants with bright splashes of wonderful flowers. In secluded places there were small sofas, on which sweet couples walking around the garden could talk about their love affairs.
Harry and Fleur also found such a sofa, standing in the most remote part of the garden, hidden from prying eyes by dense foliage of trees and bushes. Veela sat down on the sofa, leaving Potter to stand, head lowered. Having settled herself comfortably, she slowly, stretching out every word, said:
"So you zink Gabrielle is worsy of deas? I had already began to feel sorry for you, but you appeared to be ze same monster as ze one who killed your own parents. You wished the cruel deas of an innocent nine-year-old girl, and for zis you will bear a fully justifiable punishment."
Fleur raised the hem of her dress, drawing Potter's attention to her shoes. https://ibb.co/gpQqox
— Zese shoes were bought to me when I was sirteen. In zem I learned to dance, for hours I wandered around in ze waltz in my parents' estate. Today, when I was preparing for ze ball, I wanted to put on my heels, but zen decided zat because of ze dress, zey would still not be visible. So I took out zese old, but very comfortable shoes. I couldn't zink that they would be useful to me today for anysing more zan dancing.
With these words being said, she took off her shoes and climbed onto the sofa with her feet. Harry, already inwardly shuddering at what he had to do, saw that even today Fleur had put on her shoes on her bare feet. https://ibb.co/eCtUWH
Couple seconds after she kicked of her shoes the stench enveloped the area and Harry gagged. He shuddered and tumbled backward. Potter was mentally indignant: "Has this Veela ever heard of socks ?!"
Fleur, meanwhile, took up her shoes, and gazing at the teenager, said with a mocking smile: "Well, monsieur, are you ready to recall ze fragrance of my wonderful feet? Zese shoes for hours saved up ze stink of my soles while I was learning to dance." Veela handed him the shoes, and being unable to resist, he plunged his nose into them.
Inside the shoe the smell was horrific. The horrid stink burns his nostrils and turns his stomach. Coughing from the disgusting odor, Harry recoiled.
— Well, it seems zat you don't want to do willingly what I asked you to, so I have no choice but to make you do it forcefully.
With a devilish smile Fleur picked up her gross dancing shoes and beckoned Harry, inviting him to kneel in front of her. After kneeling Harry looked inside her shoes, he could very well see clear footprints in her insoles which is the proof of how old they are and how many times she has worn them. The Veela then placed his face down in her reeking shoe pushing it into its sweaty bottom only allowing him to breath her hot foot odor as air. The smell was terrible, it maked the teenager's eyes water and he swallowed trying to stop himself from vomiting.
— Oh, don't be a drama queen, zese can't be zat bad. — Fleur teased him. — Though I have been wearing zem to all my dance classes for ze last two weeks, so yeh, they may reek a bit. But it is even more interesting zis way! I wish to hear you sniffing! Smell zem harder! Inhale zat aroma wiz all your strengs.
15411211.title: Harry said "yes".

154112111.content:
Harry coughed and obeyed. He started to take big deep breaths through his nose making sure Fleur can hear him. With each breath, he got another portion of the cheesy stench that came from the depths of the cavern that was Veela's putrid dancing shoe. Harry sniffed and his heart pounded as he was forced to inhale a two weeks' worth of sweat and filth. Fleur seemed to be pleased with that because she started to stroke Hrry's hair like she's petting a dog. The humid air inside the dancing shoes wasn’t giving him enough oxygen and he was beginning to feel lightheaded.That was like hell. Harry could barely inflate his chest at all to breath and the only "air" he was getting was a stinky mixture of stenches.
Harry shuddered and squirmed in total agony yet still somehow he kept sniffing the best he could.
— Zat's enough of you just sniffing, now it's time to make zese stinkers a bit more pleasant. Start licking ze insole! — With thad said Fleur pushed Harry's poor face further into the humid inside of her shoe.
